projects: Developed and executing an automated token buy-back and burn system utilizing Jupiter CPI and Rust, thereby boosting token value through the reduction of its supply via secure market purchases and burns.
Implementing transparency measures by regularly updating the community via Twitter, fostering trust among stakeholders through transparent and automated tweets.
Engineering a cutting-edge revenue-sharing smart contract on the Solana blockchain using Rust, streamlining profit distribution among stakeholders with automation and transparency.

Developed the UI of a single sided liquidity automated market maker (SSL AMM), including seamless integration with Solana Web3 libraries to ensure real-time synchronisation with the Solana blockchain, overseeing a Total Value Locked (TVL) of $20 million & trading volume exceeding $700 million.
Enabling users to engage in yield farming with a single asset on GooseFX, allowing them to earn stake rewards, showcasing expertise in decentralised finance (DeFi).

Developed an end-to-end leaderboard system for perpetual contract users, including reading on-chain data, storing it in a database, and exposing the data through an API for ranking users based on trading volume on the platform.
Enhanced user experience of Director Trends Pages by improving keyboard and audio  interactions, ensuring compliance with 508 standards.
Integrated CASP into Director, resulting in a 20% increase in active usage of the CASP product in the US region and a 33% increase in the EU region.
Took ownership of bug fix PI and personally reduced 18% of the bugs in Director UI, improving overall system stability and user satisfaction.
Applied knowledge of WAI-ARIA concepts to optimize accessibility features, improving usability for users with special abilities.
